医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
尸体垂体衍生的生长激素输送影响医源性阿尔茨海默病尸体来源的垂体生长激素 (c-hGH) 的接受者在阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 领域发生了生物标志物变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Cadaveric-pituitary-衍生-growth-hormone-delivery-influences-iatrogenic-Alzheimere28099s-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Cadaveric-pituitary-衍生-growth-hormone-delivery-influences-iatrogenic-Alzheimere28099s-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=808264b2-7f40-4d39-bb45-f0b2cdfeedb9 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 04:44:00 -0500 Cadaveric pituitary-derived growth hormone delivery influences iatrogenic Alzheimer’s Disease
视力障碍会影响精神障碍吗？视力障碍（VI）是否影响老年人群的精神障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Does-visual-impairment-influence-mental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Does-visual-impairment-influence-mental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94b4cdbb-eda6-4b09-8207-7dd267e52003 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 04:18:00 -0500 Does visual impairment influence mental disorders?
CN Bio 任命 Joseph Parisi 为美国销售总监，以支持关键 OOC 市场的加速增长CN Bio 是一家设计和制造单器官和多器官微生理系统 (MPS) 的领先器官芯片 (OOC) 公司，今天宣布任命 Joseph Parisi 为美国销售总监。在他的新职位上，Joe 将领导公司扩大美国市场的销售和支持活动，以满足临床前药物发现中对新替代方法 (NAM) 不断增长的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/CN-Bio-appoints-Joseph-Parisi-as-US-Director-of-Sales-to-support-accelerated-growth-in-key-OOC-市场.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/CN-Bio-appoints-Joseph-Parisi-as-US-Director-of-Sales-to-support-accelerated-growth-in-key-OOC- market.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5997542e-9df9-44cd-a2c1-9328125b7cb1 Wed, 31 Jan 2024 03:04:00 -0500 CN Bio appoints Joseph Parisi as US Director of Sales to support accelerated growth in key OOC market
Enterprise Therapeutics 完成 2600 万英镑（3310 万美元）B 轮后续融资Enterprise Therapeutics Ltd（Enterprise）是一家致力于发现和开发新疗法以改善呼吸系统疾病患者生活的生物制药公司，今天宣布已完成 2600 万英镑（3310 万美元）的 B 轮后续融资本轮融资由 Panakes Partners 领投。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Enterprise-Therapeutics-closes-c2a326-million-(24331-million)-Series-B-follow-on-financing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Enterprise-Therapeutics-closes-c2a326-million-(24331-million)-Series-B-follow-on-financing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9d288974-0776-4c95-84c0-d0e6c229b30e Wed, 31 Jan 2024 02:54:00 -0500 Enterprise Therapeutics closes £26 million ($33.1 million) Series B follow-on financing
Genie Life Sciences 与 Opentrons® 合作，为 Opentrons 机器人提供新的实验室执行软件实验室工作流程执行软件提供商 Genie Life Sciences 宣布与开源液体处理机器人提供商 Opentrons Labworks, Inc. 建立合作伙伴关系，为 Opentrons 操作提供新的用户友好、强大且敏捷的软件解决方案实验室机器人和模块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Genie-Life-Sciences-partners-with-Opentronsc2aec2a0to-provide-new-lab-execution-software-for-Opentrons-robots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Genie-Life-Sciences-partners-with-Opentronsc2aec2a0to-provide-new-lab-execution-software-for-Opentrons-robots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97511d47-69c8-4dd8-8a43-338db4ee681a Wed, 31 Jan 2024 02:42:00 -0500 Genie Life Sciences partners with Opentrons® to provide new lab execution software for Opentrons robots
贝克曼库尔特生命科学与 Polycarbin 合作引领实验室可持续发展创新实验室自动化和创新领域的全球领导者贝克曼库尔特生命科学公司宣布与可持续实验室解决方案先驱 Polycarbin 建立战略合作伙伴关系，以推动液体处理自动化塑料实验室可持续性的范式转变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Beckmanc2a0Coulterc2a0Life-Sciences-and-Polycarbin-partner-to-lead-lab-sustainability-innovation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240131/Beckmanc2a0Coulterc2a0Life-Sciences-and-Polycarbin-partner-to-lead-lab-sustainability-innovation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed1b5a05-2fae-47cf-8c73-812068a1eb9c Wed, 31 Jan 2024 01:38:00 -0500 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences and Polycarbin partner to lead lab sustainability innovation
怀孕期间母亲的幸福感与孩子的大脑发育有关研究表明，怀孕期间母亲的情绪健康与儿童的大脑发育显着相关，尤其是女性后代的海马体积。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Maternal-happiness-during-pregnancy-linked-to-childs-brain-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Maternal-happiness-during-pregnancy-linked-to-childs-brain-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33cefb64-d13e-43bf-99ff-af5412335874 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 22:58:00 -0500 Maternal happiness during pregnancy linked to child's brain development
维生素 D 缺乏与痴呆风险增加有关，补充剂可能有帮助英国生物银行队列研究发现，维生素 D 缺乏和不足会显着增加患痴呆症、阿尔茨海默氏症和血管性痴呆的风险，而补充维生素 D 可能会降低这些风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Vitamin-D-deficiency-linked-to-increased-dementia-risk-supplements-may-help.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Vitamin-D-deficiency-linked-to-increased-dementia-risk-supplements-may-help.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cef6e2a-440d-4ead-92a8-4f1209de3319 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 22:45:00 -0500 Vitamin D deficiency linked to increased dementia risk, supplements may help
开心果：糖尿病前期患者控制血糖水平的理想夜间零食《营养杂志》上的研究表明，开心果作为夜间零食，可以改善糖尿病前期患者的饮食质量，对血糖控制和血管健康的影响与富含碳水化合物的零食相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Pistachios-Ideal-nighttime-snack-for-prediabetic-病人-to-manage-blood-glucose-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Pistachios-Ideal-nighttime-snack-for-prediabetic-病人-to-manage-blood-glucose-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7c5dfe1-a4eb-4257-9b19-45adf512bb52 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 22:28:00 -0500 Pistachios: Ideal nighttime snack for prediabetic patients to manage blood glucose levels
免疫蛋白 Ku70 是对抗肠癌的关键研究确定了 Ku70 在肿瘤抑制中的作用，表明这种 DNA 修复蛋白表达减少或突变会显着增加肠癌风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Immune- Protein-Ku70-key-in-fighting-bowel-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Immune- Protein-Ku70-key-in-fighting-bowel-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8719a5fb-6e0a-4ff0-b9ed-cb056bce4057 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 22:19:00 -0500 Immune protein Ku70 key in fighting bowel cancer
